Parameters

command DeleteOrderCommand

The DeleteOrderCommand request to be handled.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

The CancellationToken that can be used to request cancellation of the operation.

Returns

Task<DeleteOrderResponse>

A DeleteOrderResponse with Success being true if the Ecommerce.Application.Features.Order was deleted; Success will be false if no Ecommerce.Application.Features.Order is found or validation of the command fails. Message will contain the message to display to the user.
